Section 4 of the Evidence (Special Provisions) Act No. 14 of 1995 is as follows;
4(1)  In  any  proceeding  where  direct  oral  evidence  of  a  fact  would  be  admissible,  any
contemporaneous  recording  reproduction  thereof,  tending  to  establish  that  fact  shall  be
admissible as evidence of that fact. If it is shown that;
